column4: random question, why do my sound cards alternate between dsp and dsp1?
they don't alternate randomly, if that's what you're asking.
ah but they do, sometimes by pci card is dsp, other times dsp1 swapping with my onboard, no hardware changes
you mean pci device enumeration, then, and not "dsp and dsp1 alternating randomly"
you can fix a certain ordering if you wish.  ``asoundconf list''
and which do you always want to be card 0 (the default w/o asoundrc)?
echo options snd-via82xx index=-2 | sudo tee -a /etc/modprobe.d/alsa-base
it takes effect on next module insertion.
thank you very much, I'll post this on forums
